artist: Engraver: William Byrne; Engraver: William Woollett; After Thomas Hearne
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

In plate below image in black: [Drawn by T. Hearne  The Figure by W. Woollett  Engraved by W. Byrne/ These lone walls and storied arches have a character, marking the Virtues of the Times deceas'd; whilst ECHO from her hollow charnel Vaults/LANERCOST PRIORY/ speaks in the listening ear of CONTEMPLATION, the Epilogue to Life's MORALITY; how soon its gaudy Pagentries are pass'd, and DEATH without his mask shuts the last Scene!]; in pencil above inscription: [1-202]
title: Lanercost Priory
